markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Yuelral (The Wise)](/Deities.aspx?ID=111)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=9)

**Edicts** Practice herbalism, use and enchant gems, encourage and teach magicians and jewelers, preserve elven magic and knowledge

**Anathema** Cut a gem for aesthetic purposes, defile nature, allow the irresponsible use of magic

**Area of Concern**
gems, craft, and magic

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, N, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shattering Gem](/Spells.aspx?ID=585)

- **2nd**
[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=277)

- **3rd**
[Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188)

- **4th**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)

- **5th**
[Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343)

- **6th**
[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)

- **7th**
[Unfettered Pack](/Spells.aspx?ID=350)

- **8th**
[Prismatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=234)

- **9th**
[Nature's Enmity](/Spells.aspx?ID=205)

</column>
name: Yuelral (The Wise)
